data.eml:eml: Nomenclatural issues in the orchid bees (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Euglossina) and an updated catalogue

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nemésio, André, Rasmussen, Claus (2011): Nomenclatural issues in the orchid bees (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Euglossina) and an updated catalogue. Zootaxa 3006: 1-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203410
